official_title: To direct the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to issue an order regarding secondary cockpit barriers.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to issue an order requiring: (1) the installation of secondary cockpit barriers preventing access to the flight deck of commercial aircraft; and (2) that such secondary barriers remain locked while the aircraft is in flight and the cockpit door separating the flight deck and the passenger area is open.
